subject: Hockey, Ice
Football (College)
All Star Games
lead_paragraph: The N.H.L. descended on Columbus, Ohio, for a three-day All-Star spectacle, but the attention had to be shared with the Ohio State football team, the national champion.
snippet: The N.H.L. descended on Columbus, Ohio, for a three-day All-Star spectacle, but the attention had to be shared with the Ohio State football team, the national champion.
